div.p: Curia tenta in pretorio de abirdene per ballivos eiusdem viij die februarij anno Dominj et cetera lxxxjo

The quhilk dai It was fundin be ane assise that thomas of cullan salmak ful commpt rek
ning and hail payment til Alexander balcromby of the gudis that he had of the said alexanderis that is
tosay of certane quhite claith / and the said thomas was adiugit in ane vnlaw for the wrang
wis' withhalding tharof / and tocontent the said alexander within terme of law

the samen dai the assise has fundin and ordanit that Stevin giffard sal content and pay til alexander scrogis
j merk of vsuale monee for his chaumer mail within terme of law

Item the said dai Johne of Knollis comperit before the aldirman and balyeis / and askit at the aldirman
quhat he has done twiching his complaint made til him apon alexander forbes of the forthocht malice
complenyeit be him done til his seruand henry rede in the fisching of his wattir quhilk he has
in tak of Wil giffard / And the aldirmanis answer' was that the said alexander was warnyt be alexander
chamer seriand of his command til compere this day before the aldirman and balyeis in the court til
ansuer' and vndirly the law anent the said complaint / the quhilk alexander forbes was callit til haf compe
rit as said is like as he was warnit / and comperit nocht et cetera
Curia burgi de abirdene tenta per ballivos in pretorio eiusdem xjo die februarij anno Dominj supradicto

Quo die margareta flegear' sponsa Ricardi henrici fatebatur se habere vnum coclear argentum
ade craufurde ex mutuo a sponsa quondam dicti ade moderna / quod solutum est / et ballivi ordinarunt
eandem margaretam ad deliberandum prefatum coclear dicto Ade infra terminum Juris

Eodem die malcolmus mowat secundo die vocatus ad sectam Alexandri rede pro iniusta detencione vnius lew
auri et xxti solidorum Non comparuit / quare precipitur Dauid Duncanj seriando capere districtum et cetera et premunire
eundem / malcolmum ad comparendum in curia huius burgi hodie ad quindenam si dies ipsa Juramenta fuerit / alioquin
proxima die iuridica inde sequen' responsurus tanquam tercio die huius processus

Item eodem die Robertus de Kintor fatebatur se debere thome gardnar iiijor s' / quos ballivi precipiebant
eidem ad satisfaciendum dicto thome infra terminum Juris

Item eodem die ballivi assignauerunt Johanni chepman genero quondam angusij lilburn hodie ad quindenam
ad respondum margarete relicte quondam thome alanj super iniusta detencione vnius barelle salmonum

Thomas quhite conuictus per assisam adiudicatur in amerciamento pro iniusta perturbacione Willelmi ranyson tam verbo quam
facto et emendabit eidem ad visum proborum virorum
Et dictus Willelmus ranyson in amerciamento pro perturbio dicti thome in verbo tantum et cetera

The samen dai the assise deliuerit and ordanit that gif James of Douglas wald bring on
friday next tocum ane of the arbitrouris that he allegis to / and mak gude fath that the action
debatable betuix the said James and mawnus Wormot of j barrel of flour' and certane siluer / was
endit be arbitry / the said James is quyte of the said mawnus clame and falyeand of that /
he sal mak ful rekning and payment to the said mawnus of his clath that he had into Ree

Item the said dai the assise ordanit that gif Johne chepman wil bring suffisant witnez
on fridai next tocum that margret flegear' layd til him a siluer spone in wed of v s'
vj d' the said margret sal pay him and tak the spvne / and falyeand tharof / he sal restore
the spone to the said margret / Attour the assise fand / that the said Johne was quyte of
the breking wp of the said margretis kyst and taking of hir veschel

Item the sammyn dai Thomas scrogis producit in Jugement thomas of marr' and John' low
And the said thomas of marr' deponit be his aith that alsfer as he knew or wist / the
said thomas scrogis pait til John' moore factour til William futhes anent ane obligacion of
the said thomas scrogis / sek fraght in nawnsterdam in holand extendand til xiij s' g'
and od siluer And the said Johne low sworne deponit / that be his witting thomas scrogis pait
part of his oblicacion as said is bot he wate nocht how mekil

The xij dai of februar' the yer' of god et cetera lxxxj / Cornelis corneilsone' maistir of the brokin
schip callit mary grace producit before the aldirman and ballies Androw galichtly burges of Dunde
quhilk the gret aith sworn in presence of Johne Waskal deponit and declarit / that the vj li' g'
that was optenit / be thomas spaldyne burges of Dunde apon the said cornelis extendand
til the some' of xxij li' x s' scottis was borowit be Johne the Waus / til his singulare proffite
and nane vthiris / and that thar com na part of the said some' to the said cornelis behufe or
profite be his witting

In curia tenta in pretorio per ballivos xiijo die mensis februarij predicto Alexander balcromby constituit
Jacobum lesly prepositum et Willelmum de tulidef suos procuratores coniunctim et diuisim / ad petendum
et recipiendum a thoma culan xxvij s' g' pro bonis eiusdem alexandri alias optentis super dictum
thomam per assisam / in latissima forma procuratorij et cetera

Eodem die Dauid galichtli per concessionem propriam adiudicatur in amerciamento curie pro foristallacione
huius burgi / de qua foristallacione posuit se in voluntate prepositi

The xv dai of februar' the yer' forsaid the summons made be William quelp on
Sande mathoson is continuit with consent of bath the parties in Jugement til xv daies
eftir paisch the said summons standand in sic force and effect that dai as the princi
pale dai of the summons but preiudice of ony partie et cetera

Eodem die Johannes de culan inuenit thomam de culan plegium legalem pro eo quod gilbertus leche erit
indempnis aliter quam per viam Juris Et Andreas branch deuenit plegius legalis pro dicto gilberto de
Indempnitate Johannis de culan vt supra

The samen dai Johne chepman brocht his wif and anne beynge as the dai assignit to the said
Johne to prove / that margret flegar layd him a spone in wed of v s' vj d'
Curia tenta in pretorio burgi de abirdene per ballivos eiusdem xvj die februarij anno Dominj et cetera lxxxjo

quo die subscripti electi fuerunt in assisam videlicet Alexander fraser de Durris Johannes de marr' alexander
howison thomas prat gilbertus vaus andreas branche Johannes de glenmalvin thomas de marr'
Johannes stevinson gilbertus morison alexander hay The quhilk assise the gret aith sworn riply
avisit / has deliuerit be the mouthe of gilbert the Waus forspekar' of the said assise
that Johne of Knollis for this instant yere sal gif his warande ane half nett / of the Raik til
cristian' of cadiou / and the lave of the personis siclike wise as thai stand ordourly in
the oblicacion' et cetera
Curia legalis tenta in pretorio burgi de abirdene per ballivos eiusdem xviijuo die februarij anno Dominj supradicto

quo die sectis vocatis et curia affirmata / ballivi assignauerunt Johanni cowpar hodie ad quindenam ad respondendum ple
gio per Dauid hil super eundem porrecto de iniusta detencione trium librarum / plegio Alexandro rede pro introitu
dicti Johannis die prenotato

Eodem die actio plegij prosecuta per Dauid marr' procuratorem magistri Willelmi anffray contra et aduersus Agnetem baxtar
de iniusta detencione vnius masar / Respectuatur cum consensu eiusdem agnetis et dicti procuratoris sub spe concordie in
forma et effectu quibus nunc existit vsque hodie ad quindenam sine preiudicio parcium

The samen dai thom malcum grantit before the ballies in Jugement / that he is feit man and seruitour
til Alexander chavmer seriand' fra Witsundai furth for a yere to the keping of the over myln' and
fortomak seruice in the sammyn
Curia ballivorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio per ballivos eiusdem xxv die februarij anno quo supra

The quhilk dai Johne Wascal clamit William moyses of a bote of malvasy of his
of his awne merk and wyne with the quhilk the said William intromettit / And the said William in
presence of the aldirman and ballies declarit and deponit be his aith / that he intromettit nocht with
na bote of malvasy on his name / bot anerly on the name and the behalf of Johne colison'
and Robert blindsele and at the bidding of thaim

Item the samen dai William blindsele yongar in presence of the aldirman and ballies askit marrowschip
til him of half a nett of the mydchingil quhilk he has in assedacion of the toune Ande protestit
that gif he strekit ane hail net in faute of marrowschip that quhat expensis and costis that
he made tharapon' / sulde be refoundit til him or ony entirit with ony vthir half net / apon him

The same dai Johne Waskal in presence of the aldirman and balyeis producit James of Kintor anent
the presence of the malvasy quhilk the said James bocht fra him and the forsaid James / de
clarit be his aith / that he gef for ilke bote xviij li' to the said Johne

Item the said dai the ballies assignit til Dauid hil this dai xv dais til answer' to the borch
strekit be Johne of lambynton' vpon the wrangwis' withhaldin of xxiij li' fra the said John'
eftir the tenour of his obligacion

Item the samyn dai Robert senyour present ane certificacion of James beldy anent certan gudis of alexander
Rollandis send til Danskyn with the said Robert senyour / eftir the tenour of the first act made tharupon

Item the samen dai the said alexander rolland protestit that quhat thing Robert senyour has done or
dois or sal do in tyme tocum turne him til na preiudice anent his gudis quhilkis he send with
him til Danskyn

Eodem die malcomus mowat tercio die vocatus ad sectam alexandri rede pro iniusta detencione vnius lew
auri et xx solidorum non comparuit / quare precipitur Dauid Duncanj seriando capere districtum et cetera et premunire eundem
malcomum ad comparendum hodie ad quindenam si dies illa iuridica fuerit / alioquin proxima die iuridica
inde sequen' in curia huius burgi tanquam quarto et peremptorio die huius processus

Item the same dai It is fundin and ordanit be ane assise sworn of worthi burgez and deliuerit
be the mouthe of gilbert the vaus forspekar of the assise / that Alexander howisonnis half nett
of the mydchingil sal marrow with William blindsel yongaris half nett of the mydchingil
for this yer' tocum et cetera

The penult dai of februar' the yer' of god et cetera lxxxj becaus' that the office of belmanschip
of this burgh was vacand / the aldirman gerd the be Johne sclatar pas with the bel
throu the towne / tocharge the communite tocum to the tolbuthe / for the chesing of a belman
that war maist habil and proffitable for the toune / And with the consent of the Aldirman
balyeis consail and communite of the towne that war present in the tyme / eftir the passing
of the bel Androw murray masowne com in presence of thaim al and perofferit to
gif for that office of belmanschip for his tyme yerly to the common proffite of
the toune fyve markis And todo al vthir dewiteis and service to the toune that
ony vthir belman did of before / the Aldirman in the tyme inquirand gif ony vthir
man wald gif mare and fand na man that wald gif samekil / And furthwith
that beand done the Aldirman in the name of the toune and of the communite deliuerit til
the said Androw the bel and chesit him for al the daies of his life common' belman
with consent of the balyeis consale and communite beand present for the tyme a said is / Heratour
the said Androw is oblist tobyde and to remayn at Sanct Nicholace wark and al
vthir common warkis for his tyme for siclike fee as he may haf in vthir placis

In the court haldin be the ballies in the tolbuthe of abirdene the first dai of marche the yer' of
god et cetera lxxxj It was deliuerit be ane assise / that Dauid Kyntor sal deliuer and pay til Anny
baxtar and Wil clerk fermouris of the nethir myln / thre firlottis of malt of mvltir' / for the
malt that he grand last in the nethir myln / or ellis the price as he salde that samyn
malt within lauchful tyme

The samen dai Dauid gethane accusit be alexander rede balye for strublans of the court in his evil
answering to the officiaris he put him in wil of the aldirman and balyez tharof / and was adiugit in amercia
ment of the court for strublans of the sammyn et cetera

Item the assise deliuerit that the said Dauid gethane had brokin common ordinance in the denying of
mett / and wage giffing to the common menstralis of this burgh quharfor he was adiugit in
amerciament and togif the said menstralis thare met and wage in tyme tocum

Curia legalis tenta in pretorio burgi de abirdene per balliuos eiusdem quarto die mensis marcij
Anno Dominj supradicto / quo die sectis vocatis et curia affirmata absentes patent in rotulo sectarum

Eodem die Agnes baxtar super quam magister Willelmus vmfray extendit plegium pro iniusta detencione
vnius ciphi le masar' nuncupati primo die vocata ad respondendum dicto plegio non comparuit Ideo precipitur
Dauid Duncaj seriando capere districtum de dicta Agnete et cetera et premunire eandem ad proximam curiam
legalem tanquam secundum diem huius processus

Item eodem die Alexander rede plegius Johannis cowpar super quem Dauid hil extendit plegium pro iniusta detencione
trium librarum primo die vocatus ad comparere faciendum dictum Johannem responsurus dicto plegio non comparere fecit
eundem / quare precipitur Duncano straloch seriando capere districtum de dicto plegio et cetera et premunire eundem
ad intrandum prefatum Johannem ad proximam curiam legalem tanquam ad secundum diem huius processus / Et dictus
Dauid constituit filium suum patricium hil suum procuratorem ad prosequendum legittime istam actionem in absencia
ipsius constitutis Ipso promittens de Rato et cetera

In the court of the burgh of abirdene haldin in the tolbuthe be the ballies of the samen the viij
dai of marche yer' et cetera lxxxj Alexander howison Dauid symson gilbert vaus androw branche Wil
liam blindsel yungar thomas prat and William moyses chosin and sworn in ane assise has fundin and de
liuerit / that the thre thrid partis of Done sal ga marrow togiddir that is tosay thom symsonis Johne
Wodis and gilbert of chameris et cetera

In the court of the burgh of abirdene haldin be the balliez in the tolbuthe of the sammyn the xj dai of
marche yer' of god et cetera lxxxj Alexander sanchar' grantit him awand til a honorable knycht Sir William
of Knollis commandour of Torfichin thre libr' g' and x s' g' tobe pait til him or his factour' in the
erast schippis that passis of abirdene in flandris

the samen dai William blindsel yongar oblisit him be his landis and gudis til freith Alexander sanchar'
and tokepe him scaithles of the payment of the said some' of iij li' g' and x s' g'

Item the samen dai gilbert the Waus callit til entir Johne litstar of montros at the instance of
William moore burges of abirdene for the wrangwis' halding of thre li' scottis til commpt and rek
ning as he that com borch til entir him this dai the quhilk John' comperit nocht and the said gilbert
is oblist til entir him this dai xv dais at the instance of the said Wilyam and til answer' til him
wpon the borch strekit of the said some' in the handis of alexander chamer seriand

Item the samyn dai the action and caus' movit be John' of lambynton againis Dauid hil of
the borch strekit be the said Johne apon the forsaid Dauid wpon the wrangwis' halding of
xxiij li' be virtu of ane obligacion' of the said Dauyis made to the said Johne as clarely
apperis in it self was put til ane assise The quhilk riply avisit deliuerit / that cer
tane arbitrouris of before had made ane new poyntment betuix the saidis parties anent
the payment of the said some' / and tharupon the said Dauid present ane new obligacion to the
said assise / the quhilk obligacion last made the assise ordanit the said John' of lammyn
ton til tak as for payment of the said some' and that obligacion tobe copyit in this buke
on the said Johnis expens' the quhilk obligacion the said Johne refusit And the assise
ordanit the said Johne til deliuer the first obligacion to the said Dauid and hald the last and was
adiugit in amerciament for the wrangwis' streking of the borch apon the said Dauid

The xiij dai of marche the yer' of god et cetera lxxxj In the court of the burgh of abirdene haldin be
the balliez in the tolbuthe comperit Thomas symson' burges of the said burgh / and has set and
assignit til Duncan smyth his thrid part of a nettis fisching of the wattir' of Done the
quhilk he has in assedacion of the communite of this burgh for al the termes of the last
assedacion of this toune made tharupon that is tosay for ix yeris tocum / the said Duncan
payand the wattir mail tharof yerlie for the said termes to the aldirman and balyeis like as
the said thomas suld pay / witnez heirof James lesly aldirman Alexander rede balye
alexander menyes Dauid symson androw branche John' malisson' William moyses Adam
of craufurd and vthiris sindry

The samen dai the balye alexander rede has assignit til William moyses tomak gude
with sufficient witnes betuix this and the law dai eftir paisch that he has pait the viij s'
clamyt be John' malissone til thaim that thai suld haf bene payt to / and falyeand
tharof tobe dettour of the said some' tobe pait John' malissone et cetera

The samen xiij dai of marche comperit Alexander rede before James lesly aldirman and John' Wormot
ane of the balliez of this burgh sittand in Jugement / and has assignit his half nettis
fisching of the mydchingil quhilk he has in assedacion of the communite of this burgh til
mage of culan his spous' falyeand of him / for al his termes of the last assedacion of
this toune made tharupon' that is tosay for ix yeris tocum And falyeand of the said mage
his spous' til Sande mathoson' / and falyeand of the said Sande til Wille mathoson'
And falyeand of the said Wille til the said alexander redis ayris lauchful quhatsumeuir
before thir witnez alexander menyes Dauid symsone androw branche Johne malissone Wil
liam moyses adam of craufurd Duncan smyth and vthiris diuersis

Curia legalis tenta in pretorio burgi de abirdene per Dauid menyes vnum ballivorum eiusdem xviijuo
die marcij anno et cetera lxxxjmo / quo die sectis vocatis et curia affirmata et cetera

Eodem die Agnes baxtar secundo die vocata ad sectam procuratoris magistri Willelmi vmfray vt patet in rotulamento primj
diei / non comparuit Ideo precipitur philippo de Dunbrek seriendo capere districtum et cetera et premunire eandem ad proximam
curiam legalem tanquam tercium diem huius processus

xxijo die marcij anno supradicto In curia ballivorum subscripti carnifices amerciatur per confessiones proprias
pro fractione communis statuti et ordinacionis burgi in empcione piscium ante horum eis limitatam priusquam deseruiatur burgensibus
et communitati ville et cetera videlicet Johannes narne thomas narne Robertus fleschar' andreas lowson andreas raa cristinus
prat alexander prat alexander lammynton' andreas lambynton'
Duncanus de lammynton conuictus per assisam adiudicatur in amerciamento pro fractione communis ordinacionis ut supra

the samen dai anent a frayar' of feggis clamyt be William of cadiou fra margret the spous'
of fynlaw fores the assise deliuerit and ordanit that gif the said margret wald swere that it
was nocht pait / that scho suld pay it til Wil of cadiou within lauchful terme and scho refusit the aith

Andreas lowson conuictus per assisam adiudicatur in amerciamento pro iniusta perturbacione Dauid hil et emendare
eidem de dicto perturbio facto verbo vt Jura volunt

In the court of the burgh of abirdene haldin in the tolbuthe be alexander rede ane of the balliez of
the samen the xxvj dai of marche the yer' of god et cetera lxxxij Cristian hukstar' convict / be ane
assise was adiugit in amerciament for the wrangwis' refusing of the kingis coppir monee
and til forbere in tyme tocum et cetera And thir ar the names of the said assise Androw branch William
more androw murray eldar James clerk Wil androson Dauid gethan Wil gray Dauid robertsone
Dauid galichtly and Wil of Dunbrek Item chosin til thaim for vthir action g' vaus John vaus and Wil moys'

thom of buchan Wil of buchan Wil burges and the wif of quhilum Johne clerk conuict be the assise
for breking of common' ordinance nocht kepand the paas of the brede ilkane in amerciament et cetera
Curia tenta in pretorio burgi de abirdene per ballivos eiusdem xxviij die marcij anno et cetera lxxxijdo

quo die auctoritate ballivorum Actio plegij prosecuta per Willelmum blindsele iuniorem aduersus alexandrum howison
respectuatur ad cristinum diem propter debilitatem presentis curie in statu quo nunc existit absque preiudicio et cetera

In the court haldin be the balliez in the tolbuthe the xxix dai of marche the yer' forsaid / Wil
buchan put him in wil of the ballies of the breking of paas' of the brede quharfor he was
adiugit in amerciament and til forbere in tyme tocum

The samen dai William blindsel comperit before the balliez in Jugement and askit at
thame toger cal Alexander howison til answer' to a borgh that the said William straik in
the hand of philp of Dunbrek seriand apon the said alexander / that wrangwisly and againis the
law he fand him na marrowschip as was ordanit him til do be ane sworn assise /
the quhilk alexander was callit and nocht kcomperit / And than the said William made his protesta
cione before the balliez in Jugement / sen his man / his net and his cobil hyre was
redy and offerit before the ballies / quhat scaith that he had sustenit or mycht sustene
in faute of mawrouschip suld be wprichtit til him / as he that couth get na marrow
schip of the forsaid alexander / and oft tymes had requirit it /

Item the said dai it was deliuerit and ordanit be ane assise that gif gilbert morison couth
preve / that thir was a condicion betuix him and robert nevison / that quhat tym the said Ro
bert did nocht til his labour' that he suld do that he suld haf his leve apon the
morn / that this beand done / the said gilbert sal haf his butis and iij s' j d' les of siluer
and a new schete / And gif the said gilbert falyeis in his preif the said Robert sal
haf regres til his labour'

And the samen dai the said gilbert producit for the said preif twa of the falowschip
James henrison and Johne scrogy quhilkis sworn in presence of alexander rede balye depo
nit that the said Robert nevison com nocht til his labour' as his condicion' was / and that he
bure him nocht til his mastir and the falowschip as he promittit todo / for the quhilk
he suld haf his leve as said is / and acht til restore to the said gilbert his butis and
iij s' j d' les and his schete

Item the same dai the ballies assignit til Johne talyour the law dai eftir paisch til answer'
to the borch strekit on him be androw Wormot of the wrangwis' halding of thre tynning sto
pis fra him as he that perofferit him x s' for the outequiting of thaim of the quhilkis ane contenis
demj galon' the tothir iiij pyntis and the thrid a sext part / And the said androw has constitute Richart
hil the sone his procuratour to folou this action as law wil / promittand ferm and stable et cetera

The assise has ordanit that the baxtaris sal mak viij vncis of gude bakin brede for
j d' and falyeand tharof tobe expellit fra the craft for a yer' and dai / and that thai murmour
nocht the assise vndir sic pane as efferis

Curia legalis tenta in pretorio burgi de abirdene per balliuos eiusdem primo die mensis Aprilis anno
Dominj et cetera lxxxijdo / quo die sectis vocatis et curia affirmata et cetera

Eodem die Willelmus moore extendit plegium super Johannem litstar' burgensem de montros / de iniusta deten
cione xxxijor s' ab eodem de resta maioris summe / quj quidem Johannes peciit diem legalem ad respondendum dicto plegio
et ballivi assignauerunt eidem hodie ad quindenam / et gilbertus Waus deuenit plegius pro Introitu dicti Johannis
illo die responsurus vt Jura volunt

The samen dai It is fundin and deliuerit be ane assise anent the borgh / that William blindsel strekit
on Alexander howison / that the said alexander acht til wprycht him of al scathis sustenit be the said Wil
liam throu the said alexander in faute of marrowschip of half a net / of the mydchingil sen the fisch
was put in querding / and that thai fynd a queyrd of salmond before this day tobe deliuer
it til William blindsel And quhat scathis that the said William sustenis in tyme tocum / that the said
alexander sal wprycht him vnto the tyme / that he marrow with him

Item eodem die Agnes baxtar tercio die vocata ad sectam procuratoris magistri Willelmi vmfray pro iniusta detencione vnius
masar' non comparuit Ideo precipitur philippo de Dunbrek seriendo capere districtum et cetera et premunire eandem ad
proximam curiam legalem tanquam quartum et peremptorium diem huius processus

Eodem die alexander rede secundo die vocatus ad intrandum Johannem cowpar pro quo deuenit plegius ad sectam Dauid
hil pro iniusta detencione iij libr' / non intrauit eundum / quare precipitur Duncano straloch seriando capere districtum
de dicto plegio / et premunire ipsum ad comparere faciendum dictum Johannem ad proximam curiam legalem
tanquam tercium diem huius processus

Alexander stokar' convict / be ane assise is amerciate for the wrangwis' taking of certane schone fra androw
michelson Dauy ego and androw skirpy / and ordanit til forber' in tyme tocum

Item the samen dai Johne Wormot balye chargit William moore be his awne graunt to
deliuer til the spous' of Johne' litstar in the grene a lyon' of gold / the quhilk scho has assig
nit til hir gude son' thom gledstan' / and tobe deliuerit til hir or the said thomas within terme of law

The samen dai Johne colison and John' Wormot ar purely and simply summittit before the
aldirman balliez and counsale / anent a quartar of a nett' of the mydchingil quhilk John'
Wormot clamis til haf rycht to / til thir persons vndirwritin that is tosay Alexander menyes Johne
of marr' Dauid symson' alexander howison' gilbert the Waus Johne the Waus Wilyam
blindsel thomas prat Dauid mathosone' androw murray and Dauid Kintor / and falyeand of ony
of thar totak vthiris likand to bath the partiez / tobe chosin in ane assise the quhilkis persons beand
sworn' sal fynd declare and finaly determyne quhilk of the saidis John' colison and John
Wormot has verray rycht to the said quartar net / of the mydchingil debatable betuix
thaim and thai bath ar oblist til stand to the determinacion and deliuerance of the said assise / And
als' gif the forsaid assise fyndis that John' Wormot suld see the lettre of assedacion that John'
colison' has it salbe red and schawne til him be the sycht and avise of the same assise

Die secundo mensis Aprilis anno Dominj et cetera lxxxijdo / Johannes de Knollis deuenit plegius legalis
pro Johanne colison genero suo et marco scot / quod Johannes Wormot et pars sua erunt indempnes
de eis et parte sua aliter quam per viam Juris

Et Thomas de fife deuenit plegius legalis pro Johanne Wormot et Jacobo de Kintor quod
Johannes colison et marcus scot et pars sua erunt indempnes de eis et parte sua aliter quam per
viam Juris

Quo die In curia affirmata coram preposito et ballivis Johannes colison et Johannes Wormot
accusati de perturbacione adinuicem sub plegiis legalibus ante hodiernum diem per ipsos inuentos ut ass
negabant dictam calumpniam Vnde hoc positum fuit ad assisam proborum virorum Juratorum videlicet Alexandri
menyes alexandri howison Dauid symson gilberti Waus Johannis Willelmi blindsel andree
murray Jacobi clerc et Duncanj smyth / Quj auisati posuerunt determinacionem huius actionis in dilacione
vsque crastinum diem Et dicti Johannes colison et Johannes Wormot in presencia prepositi et ballivorum obligantur
stare decreto et determinacioni prefate assise et aliorum quorumcumque per eandem assisam adducendorum
tam penes dictam actionem perturbij quam Jus aque quarterij rethis de mydchingil debatabilis
inter eosdem / et quod subibunt dictam detencionem crastina die vt premittur

Curia tenta in pretorio burgi de Abirdene per ballivos eiusdem tercio die mensis marcij
anno Domini supradicto /

quo die Johannes colison conuictus per assisam prescriptam adiudicatur
in amerciamento curie pro iniusta perturbacione Johannis Wormot et tenetur emendare eidem ad visum
proborum virorum / et Idem Johannes colison' quitus factus fuit per eandem assisam de infrictione
plegiorum legalium

Et Johannes Wormot quitus factus fuit per assisam de iniusta perturbacione dicti Johannis
colisone' et de infrictione plegiorum legalium

Eodem die Inuentum fuit determinatum et deliberatum per dictam assisam quod Johannes colisone ha
bet plenum Jus ad quarterium Rethis de mydchingil clamat' per Johannem Wormot secundum
formam et tenorem littere assedacionis quam dictus Johannes colison inde habet sub sigillo communi dicti burgi
quam quidem assedacionem eadem assisa decernit validam super omnibus contentis in eadem quo ad integrum
dimidium rethis eiusdem aque

In the court haldin in the tolbuthe of the burgh of abirdene be the ballies of the samen the
x dai of aprile yer' et cetera lxxxij / the action of marrowschip of half a net of Done belang
ing Alexander menyes with ane vthir half net belanging til Dauid symson and the debate of
the samyn was put til a sworn assise / the quhilk riply avisit deliuerit / that gif Da
uid symson wald swere the gret aith / that he marrowit nocht with the said Alexander bot condicio
naly that he suld warrand to the said Dauid the sext part of the fisch / than the said
Dauid suld be quyte of the said marrowschip the quhilk aith the said Dauid refusit
And swa is he fundin tokepe marrowschip to the said alexander et cetera
